replies.msg:
Valverde's press conference ahead of tomorrow's game against Getafe.

Valverde: "I have the strength to continue. It's not the time to hide. I've talked with the president. I got the trust of the directors."

Valverde: "Yes, I will stay at Barcelona next season. I am fine and excited to continue here."

Valverde: "We went through a very difficult week. Tomorrow, we have to prove that we are here, we want to play again."

Valverde: "The Liverpool match is still in my head. We created many opportunities in the first half but we did not score, in the second half they scored two goals in two minutes."

Valverde: "We received a strong slap and the match of Getafe will be suitable to return to the right path. We must overcome these things and think about the future."

Valverde: "We still have a very important game, we play on it in order to win the title. Our goal was to win the treble, but we couldn't do it. The season is not over and we have a final cup game. If we win it, we will achieve the double."

Chelsea have given a positive response because of the likely departure of Hazard. Abramovich sees in Coutinho a player who can lead his project. The problem is that they are currently facing a transfer ban that will prevent them from signing players. [cadena ser]

Chelsea's transfer ban does not worry them much in London because they know the steps to follow. They will file an appeal to the TAS, something that has helped both Barcelona and Real Madrid in the past. [cadena ser]

ğŸ“° [SPORT] | AS: Encounter between Rakitic and Boixos Nois at the player's home.

ğŸ”¶ According to AS, the Croatian gave explanations to the cules radicals of his attendance at the Seville fair.

ğŸ”· The group of fans went to Ivan's house and he was made to give explanations.

Rakitic was paid a visit by the Boixes Nois after his return from Seville on Friday. The group stood in front of his house when he arrived home, and they talked for a few minutes.


The group, without any further incidents, reproached him about his attitude and asked him to be more committed in the games that remain.

quote.msg:
ğŸ“° [SPORT] | AS: Encounter between Rakitic and Boixos Nois at the player's home.

ğŸ”¶ According to AS, the Croatian gave explanations to the cules radicals of his attendance at the Seville fair.

ğŸ”· The group of fans went to Ivan's house and he was made to give explanations.

Rakitic was paid a visit by the Boixes Nois after his return from Seville on Friday. The group stood in front of his house when he arrived home, and they talked for a few minutes.


The group, without any further incidents, reproached him about his attitude and asked him to be more committed in the games that remain.

replies.msg: There is no going back: The operation to sell Coutinho and buy Griezmann has been activated. Barcelona will try to negotiate with Atlético Madrid to avoid paying the striker's release clause and maintain a healthy relationship with them. [sport]
Messi is upset because of the whistles to Coutinho and Busquets against Getafe when he had asked the Camp Nou to support the team. [cadena ser]

Matthijs de Ligt wants to be sure of playing time and a generous salary. Barça have let him know that he is a solid bet for many years to come. The club will continue to negotiate in the coming days, and when the Eredivisie ends (tomorrow), negotiations will accelerate. [md]
Entire dressing room wants Valverde to stay and players went as far as blaming themselves for Liverpool rather than the coach.
